rules_text:
When this enchantment enters, each opponent sacrifices a nontoken creature and each player takes a burden.
[i]Otherworld[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have been burdened three or more times, transform this enchantment.
rules_text2:
Lifelink
When this creature dies, target opponent loses 1 life for each nonland card in their graveyard and you gain 1 life for each nonland card in your graveyard.
